trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 컨트롤 집합의 기능을 사용 하 여 두 연결을 만들 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>또는 기타 서버 컨트롤의 공급자 및 데이터의 소비자를 역할을 하나 컨트롤과.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: 연결을 구성 하기 위해 두 컨트롤에서 상속 되는 영역에 있어야는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>클래스 (같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>컨트롤), 공용 인터페이스를 통해 데이터를 공유할 올바르게 디자인 해야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 클래스는 이벤트 데이터를 사용 하는 메서드에 전달 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>이벤트를 처리 하는 대리자입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: 두 가지가 있습니다 이러한 연결 관련 이벤트 데이터를 제공할 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 클래스를 사용 하 여 이벤트를 발생 시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다의 구성원은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>메서드를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>두 개의 서버 컨트롤 성공적으로 연결한 후에 이벤트 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>메서드를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>두 개의 서버 컨트롤의 연결이 끊어진 후에 이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: 개발자가 사용자 지정 이벤트 처리기 메서드를 만들 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>이벤트 및 해당 메서드에서 연결의 액세스 세부 정보를 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 클래스를 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 개발자를 선언할 수는 `OnWebPartsConnected` 특성을 `<asp:webpartmanager>` 요소, 이벤트를 처리 하는 사용자 지정 메서드 이름이 여기에 할당 하 고 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the WebPartConnectionsEventArgs object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 개발자가 사용자 지정 처리기 메서드에서 매개 변수로 메서드에 전달 되는 WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 개체를 사용 하 여 한 연결 정보를 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 클래스에는 생성자의 두 가지 오버 로드가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>생성자가 기본; 클래스에 대 한 속성 값 초기화</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>생성자는 기본 생성자를 호출 하 고 다음 초기화는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartConnectionsEventArgs class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsEventArgs 클래스에는 웹 파트 연결의 필수적인 부분을 참조 하는 중 일부는 여러 속성이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>를 연결 된 속성은 참조 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>전체 연결을 나타내는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>속성 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>또는 연결에서 공급자 역할을 다른 서버 컨트롤 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A>속성 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>또는 소비자 역할을 하는 서버 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>속성이 참조 합니다. 연결의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>개체 동안는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A>속성 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> class without requiring a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref> 요구 하지 않고 클래스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자입니다.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 필요 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: 생성자를 각 해당 연결 관련 매개 변수 개체의 해당 속성에 할당 하 여 해당 속성의 값을 초기화 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: 공급자 역할을 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: 공급자 연결 지점입니다.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 소비자 역할을 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: 소비자 연결 지점입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 지정 된 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: 이 버전의는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>생성자는 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>개체를 사용할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 또는 공급자 역할을 하는 서버 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 또는 소비자 역할을 하는 서버 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> 연결 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> 현재 연결의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>공급자 컨트롤, 공급자의 연결 지점, 소비자 컨트롤 및 소비자 연결 지점에 대 한 참조를 포함 하는 웹 파트 연결의 모든 세부 정보를 포함 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, 및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 제어 즉 연결에 소비자 역할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 영역의 컨트롤 간의 연결에는 소비자 역할을 하는 공급자와 다른 역할을 하나 컨트롤이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 각 컨트롤에는 정의 된 연결 지점이 있어야 합니다. 소비자의 경우 연결 지점 이어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, 및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 소비자 역할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> 현재 연결의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 영역의 컨트롤 간의 연결에는 소비자 역할을 하는 공급자와 다른 역할을 하나 컨트롤이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 각 컨트롤에는 정의 된 연결 지점이 있어야 합니다. 소비자의 경우 연결 지점 이어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, 및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint"> </xref> 현재 연결의 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 제어 즉 연결에서 공급자 역할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 영역의 컨트롤 간의 연결에는 소비자 역할을 하는 공급자와 다른 역할을 하나 컨트롤이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 각 컨트롤에는 정의 된 연결 지점이 있어야 합니다. 공급자의 경우 연결 지점 이어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, 및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> 공급자 역할을 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> 현재 연결의 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 영역의 컨트롤 간의 연결에는 소비자 역할을 하는 공급자와 다른 역할을 하나 컨트롤이 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: 각 컨트롤에는 정의 된 연결 지점이 있어야 합니다. 공급자의 경우 연결 지점 이어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint>

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 웹 파트 연결에 대 한 세부 정보를 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, 및 [웹 파트 연결 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"></xref> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint"> </xref> 현재 연결의 합니다.
